game.name: Caveman Hunt
game.description:
We have heard many lovely stories that what kind of challenges cavemen dealt with to make their lives smoother and easier. However, today we want to introduce a hairy hunter who has prepared a human catapult on his own. Now he wants your help to launch this tool closer to his mammoth dinner. Would you be interested in taking this challenge? Join Caveman Hunt and be prepared to guide this cool caveman to catch his favourite animals! The gameplay of this cool adventure game is pretty simple. 
Your objective is to attack animals by using your stretch and try to go for as long as possible to get the high scores. Training your reaction skills will help make your way towards achieving your goal successfully. Keep your hands on the mouse or tap the screen to launch your hunter into the air wisely! Make sure to catch up the mammoth meat by gaining the enough speed on the track of this HTML5 platform game. Perform nice and earn points to upgrade your skills and stats!
Keep working on your technique to improve the result and put some enough food on the table for your cave family! Use the slingshot to throw him at the mammoth! Control the arrow to set the angle of the slingshot and then do not forget to set the power the shot by clicking again on the screen! Make sure to keep him flying to get the mammoth. Do not forget to give him the needful boost with the help of other animals and trampolines since he is unable to keep his feet on the ground for long. Grab the power-ups to buy upgrades later! Good luck for an amazing hunting experience!
